item.title: ‘It’s Colonizing All Over Again:’ Chefs and Tortilleros React to California’s Fortified Tortilla Mandate
item.description:
A new California law, penned by a Fresno assemblyman, mandates folic acid in corn tortillas to curb birth defects in Latina women—rattling L.A.'s taco universe. Tortilla makers in California, who have followed the same 12,000 year-old recipe, now must add a synthetic vitamin... but not all are complying.

item.title: Vandenberg Hosts Base Tour for San Luis Obispo Chamber of Commerce
item.description: Vandenberg Hosts Base Tour for San Luis Obispo Chamber of Commerce at Vandenberg Space Force Base, Calif., Dec. 19, 2025. The tour group was introduced to numerous facilities on base including the Space Launch Delta 30 headquarters building, Remote Launch Control Center, Pacific Coast Club, and Firefly Aerospace located at SLC-2. The tour provided details on Vandenberg’s various commercial partnerships, emphasizing its critical role in maintaining national strategic advantages in space.
item.source:markdown:
Vandenberg Hosts Base Tour for San Luis Obispo Chamber of Commerce at Vandenberg Space Force Base, Calif., Dec. 19, 2025. The tour group was introduced to numerous facilities on base including the Space Launch Delta 30 headquarters building, Remote Launch Control Center, Pacific Coast Club, and Firefly Aerospace located at SLC-2. The tour provided details on Vandenberg’s various commercial partnerships, emphasizing its critical role in maintaining national strategic advantages in space.
![Members of the San Luis Obispo Chamber of Commerce stand together for a group photo inside Space Launch Complex 2.](https://media.defense.gov/2025/Dec/22/2003848506/300/300/0/251219-X-DW038-1005.JPG)
